review_body: No pics!?!? Read the reviews of the first two who stayed here. Notice the others who wrote reviews only have 1 each. They all sound alike. There is no such place. It’s your own fault if you let them SCAM you

I can not recommend this place enough!! Amazing views day/night! Within walking distance of Time Square and many amazing restaurants/bars - located literally in the heart of NYC. The host was extremely welcoming and easily contactable at all times for any questions or queries! You cannot go wrong with this place and we will definitely be staying here next time!!

This was a Superb property we stayed in. Very clean, spacious and luxurious. Waking up to those views was very serene. Location was also great. 10 min walk to times square and many bars and restaurants. Highly recommended and when me and my business partner come back we'll be staying here again.

The place was amazing, I had no complaints. The host was great with any questions or needs I may have had. With great views of the city of New York, I would definitely be staying here again next time I visit the city.

First of all Nyc is a wonderful place. I have had a fantastic time here. It’s a big suite very huge and good for long time customers that enjoys to cook. I loved the views and the confortable bed here. next time I’ll come with my family . This time was for business .

Our stay couldn't have been more perfect. The location for starters is PRIME. Close to everything, several very cool and delicious restaurants, a CVS right downstairs, grocery store right across the street, Times Square just a couple blocks away. The unit itself was sparkling clean and had everything we needed. Full kitchen with everything we needed to cook up a few meals. The unit even provides umbrellas which we found very convenient while traveling. It was ideal to have 2 bedrooms for the family with 2 king beds. THE VIEW was the cherry on top. This is a very special place. Highly recommend!
